item.description:
Let's Revel in Some Pre-Holiday Cheer! 

Meetup at The Grand Cru Wine Bar & Grill at the Cape Codder Resort for Dinner & Entertainment.

The menu features creatively prepared regional fare in a casual, yet elegant atmosphere with an extensive list of tapas, salads, local fish and shellfish, and desserts made in-house. Known for their list of carefully selected fine wines by the bottle, glass or 2 oz. taste, but they also boast the best martini list on Cape Cod, as well as classic cocktails, ports, cognacs, single malt scotches and ice-cold bottled and draft beer.

Friday night entertainment to be announced! Another Good Time to Look Forward To!

Note:  Grand Cru Wine Bar & Grill is a small venue.  Last year many backed out after Grand Cru went out of their way to accomodate our Meetup group.  Right now Grand Cru is allowing us a reservation for 12.  It is critical that you are serious about attending.  

Double Note:  I'm able to get a second table for the 5 other ladies on the wait list!  Whoo Hoo!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a Santa Hat!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Cape Codder Resort ---Grand Cru Wine Bar & Grill Dinner & Entertainment
